name: Seven Worlds
description:
welcome to seven worlds demo 

what are you looking for frame? gold? adventure?

 help Sixx  travel across the seven worlds. 

A&D OR Arrows to move Space to JUMP  X OR Left Click To Attack

collect coins and diamonds to win GOOD LUCK

this is a work in progress in it early phase 

would love to hear feedback on what I could do to improve it. this is part one for seven words series .

credit:  Miguelsgp Itch, Foozle 

also shoutout to fellow member Tonic for Music
